thread.title: In honor of Drew Barrymore’s birthday, here are the beauty looks of hers that made us swoon
thread.title_full: In honor of Drew Barrymore’s birthday, here are the beauty looks of hers that made us swoon

author: Amanda Grace
title: In honor of Drew Barrymore’s birthday, here are the beauty looks of hers that made us swoon
text:
In honor of Drew Barrymore’s birthday, here are the beauty looks of hers that made us swoon Today we are celebrating the birth of Drew Barrymore , one of our most favorite and inspiring celebs. Drew is a beauty icon, shining in the spotlight for most of her life. From the cute little sister in E.T. to the flesh-hungry suburban mom in Santa Clarita Diet , we have fallen under Drew’s spell time and time again. While most of us ugly cry and live off ice cream after a breakup, Drew produced, directed, and starred in her new Netflix show . While we aren’t sure exactly what (or who!) she is eating to look so radiant, she is as beautiful as ever!
In honor of her birthday, here are 16 0f our favorite Drew Barrymore beauty looks! 1. Flower Crown and Blue Eyeliner Paul Zimmerman / Getty Images 2. Ombré Waves and Red Lips Jason Kempin / Getty Images 3. Fresh-Faced with Pink Satin Lips Steve Granitz / Getty Images 4. Bronzed with a Mermaid-like Braid Amanda Edwards / Getty Images 5. Chocolate Curls with Dusty Pink Lipstick Gregory Pace / Getty Images 6. Daisies and Berry Lips S. Granitz / Getty Images 7. Soft Waves and Brown Lipstick Jason Merritt / Getty Images 8. Liquid Liner and Hot Pink Glossy Lips Jon Kopaloff / Getty Images 9. Beautifully Bare-Faced with Red Lips Lawrence Lucier / Getty Images 10. Smoky Eyes and Glam-Goddess Hair Gareth Cattermole / Getty Images 11. Glossy Red Lips and a Sleek Ponytail D Dipasupil / Getty Images 12. Burgundy Liner and Nude Lips Jason LaVeris / Getty Images 13. ’70s Waves and Glossy Lips Robin Marchant / Getty Images 14. Classic Hollywood Glamour with Pastel Blue Shadow Steve Granitz / Getty Images 15. Sultry Light Gray Lids Carlo Allegri / Getty Images 16. ’60s Beehive and Nude Lips Jon Kopaloff / Getty Images Happy Birthday, Drew Barrymore! Thank you for the years of beauty inspo!
